subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|㹜|t1=two dogs|言|t2=words|ls=ic}} (㹜 = [[犭]] + [[犬]], two forms of “dog”). A place where dogs are barking (言) at each other, a jail with guard dogs.
